text: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
author: A.A. Milne

text: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes.
author: Jim Carrey

text: I am so clever that sometimes I don’t understand a single word of what I am saying.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
author: Steven Wright

text: I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early.
author: Charles Lamb

text: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
author: Unknown

text: If you think nobody cares if you’re alive, try missing a couple of payments.
author: Earl Wilson

text: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.
author: Joe Girard

text: I am on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it.
author: Unknown

text: Never put off till tomorrow what you can do the day after tomorrow.
author: Mark Twain

text: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
author: Lily Tomlin

text: A day without laughter is a day wasted.
author: Charlie Chaplin

text: Life is short. Smile while you still have teeth.
author: Unknown

text: Why don’t scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
author: Unknown

text: I used to think I was indecisive, but now I’m not too sure.
author: Unknown

text: If at first you don’t succeed, then skydiving definitely isn’t for you.
author: Steven Wright

text: I told my wife she should embrace her mistakes. She gave me a hug.
author: Unknown

text: Why don’t graveyards ever get overcrowded? Because people are dying to get in.
author: Unknown

text: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
author: Alan Dundes

text: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
author: Steven Wright

text: The difference between genius and stupidity is that genius has its limits.
author: Albert Einstein

text: Why don’t some couples go to the gym? Because some relationships don’t work out.
author: Unknown

text: I’m not arguing, I’m just explaining why I’m right.
author: Unknown

text: You can’t have everything… where would you put it?
author: Steven Wright

text: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
author: Benjamin Franklin

text: Always borrow money from a pessimist. He won’t expect it back.
author: Oscar Wilde

text: If you want your children to listen, try talking softly to someone else.
author: Ann Landers

text: By working faithfully eight hours a day, you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
author: Robert Frost

text: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
author: Mitch Hedberg

text: The road to success is always under construction.
author: Lily Tomlin
